creator: Gerd.Castan@z.zgs.de
text:
Hi,

Using Apache Batik 1.0 final (batik-svgbrowser.jar) on Mac OS X 10.0.3 
any SVG file looks like pay tv without decoder. I put an example on

http://www.s-line.de/homepages/gerd_castan/batikonx/index.html

Is this a Mac Os X Java bug or a Batik bug? Is this a known bug?

Cheers,
   Gerd

creator: Gerd.Castan@z.zgs.de
text: The same bug is in 1.0 beta 2.  The first beta works fine.

creator: deweese@apache.org
text: *** Bug 2045 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: Gerd.Castan@z.zgs.de
text:
Seems that this is a bug in Apples Java implementation (of Graphics2D).
It looks much better using JDK 1.3.1 DP2.

There is still a problem that there is a big part of the pictures that is not
shown.

Gerd

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
Actually now it just cuts parts of it off :)
We are working with Apple to try and get it working.
